name: Head Start Program (HS)
short_desc: Head Start promotes school readiness for children ages 3 to 5 by providing activities that foster children's social, emotional, and cognitive skills and physical health
description: Head Start promotes school readiness for children ages 3 to 5 by providing activities that foster children's social, emotional, and cognitive skills and physical health. Full and half day program options are available at 17 locations throughout the city. The program provides children and families with opportunities to be involved in program activities, advocating and linking them with community service agencies that support needs and goals. 10% of slots are reserved for children with disabilities.
